Hymn.Arabic: أحببت أن يسمع الرب صوت تضرعى ,
Hymn.English: 116:1 I love the Lord, because He has heard My voice and my supplications.

Hymn.Arabic: لأنه أمال بسمعه إلى , فدعوته فى أيامى . الليلويا
Hymn.English: 2 Because He has inclined His ear to me, Therefore I will call upon Him as long as I live.     Alleluia
